DVB Codec Documentation

Introduction

This documentation has been auto-generated from the DVB codec source files, using Doxygen.

The DVB codec converts DVB sections from binary format into text format, and from text back into binary if required. The parsing engine which drives both the encode and decode is implemented using the Boost Spirit library.

The development of this codec was documented in an article A Mini-Project to Decode a Mini-Langauge which has been published by the ACCU.

References

  • Boost C++ source libraries
  • Spirit parser framework
  • ACCU
  • Thomas Guest's homepage
